tool.description: : Wrapper of the AmberTools (AMBER MD Package) leap tool module.

param.name: input_pdb_path
param.label: input PDB file
param.help: Input 3D structure PDB file. Format: [input].pdb

param.name: input_lib_path
param.label: input LIB,ZIP file
param.help: Input ligand library parameters file. Format: [input].[format]

param.help: Input ligand frcmod parameters file. Format: [input].[format]

param.help: Additional leap command files to load with source Leap command. Format: [input].[format]
